name: PocketWings: Discovery Island
description:
Discover the freedom of flight and explore a fun island world in this latest physics-based "game toy" from Eric "Hellcats" Parker.


FEATURES:

23 different planes.

Detailed miniature island world with a diversity of natural and man-made environments and a few surprises and fun twists on reality.

Instant replay feature allows you to rewind and fast-forward through the action to choreograph your own "movie".

Please send questions and constructive comments to support@pocketwings.com.
